body.name: Align Razor – Premium Single Blade Razors For Men, Double Edge Razor Blade, Safety Razor for Face and Beard, Shaving Razors for Men with Razor Stand and 5 Blade Refill (Space Grey)
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 16 hrs 58 mins
features: CLOSE SHAVE – The Align Single Blade Razor is designed for a comfortable, close shave. Enjoy a smooth shave with our safety razor blade while reducing your chances of ingrown hair and razor burns.
RUST RESISTANT – BOVEM's safety razors for men come with precision-engineered brass handle and zinc alloy head, finished with a rust-resistant coating. One of the best razors for men shaving!
BRASS GRIP – Our double edge safety razor comes with perfectly weighted and textured handle is designed to fit into the grip of your hands, providing a well-balanced manoeuvre around your face.
LIFETIME OF SHAVES – BOVEM's razor for men comes with double edge razor blades that provides a superb shaving experience. The reusable razor is refillable with any double edge safety razor blades.

RECOMMENDED USE – Align the shaving razor at a 30° angle and hold your skin taut to stretch the skin as you shave. Only apply gentle pressure and let the weight of the mens safety razor do the hard work. Shave in short strokes and rotate the double sided razor blades every once in awhile. We recommend using shaving cream while you shave.
GUARANTEES – All our men's safety shaving razors are protected by a one-year limited warranty against defects. It's time you experience what BOVEM's mens single blade razor can do.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars truly amazing razor
reviews.reviewText: I bought 2 razors from this brand - one in space grey and another in silver because of its aesthetic look (one of it was as a gift). I have to say, this is one of the most amazing razors ive ever tried. Not only does it look as good as in the photos, it gave me a super smooth shave as well. I did not have razor bumps or any cuts on my face that I usually would get when I use those multiblade razors. It's generally easy to learn to shave with this and I really enjoyed this one. Would recommend to anyone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars El peso de la máquina.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for women too
reviews.reviewText: This is a nice upgrade from my old razor. I’ve had it for a couple months now and I love that I can leave it in my shower. My older one would rust and couldn’t be left in the shower. I’ve also found the perfect shaving cream combo (at least for me). This thing gives me such a smooth close shave and I use this bad boy on basically everything. It’s very sharp! So be careful, but definitely recommend.

Reviewed in the United States on February 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I found this razor perfectly balanced, a nice weight without being too heavy and performs exceptionally well. I highly recommend it for a very comfortable shave.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good razor to get started with wet shaving.
reviews.reviewText: This is a really nice set. At first I thought it would be like all the other cheap razors you see on Amazon. But it's slightly different. The ends of the head extend out past the edge of the blade. So you don't have a sharp edge hanging out where it could nick an ear. The finish is really nice. I have a polished chrome look. It also come with a matching stand, and that is something just a little nicer than the rest. I found it to be a mild yet efficient shave. A razor that a beginner could use comfortable without a fear of getting cut, but still have impressive results.The one thing that I wasn't impressed with. Maybe I just got a bad one, but as you thread the handle onto the head, the threads are really, really loose. When you have the handle threaded about half way up, it should be pretty solid. But on this razor, there is a lot of side to side movement in the threads. The handle does snug up to the head and hold the head firmly. But the threads are not mated well and I feel that in the long run, this will be the fail point in this razor. The good news is that it has a standard thread and if the threads in the handle strip, you can buy a replacement handle from any of your favorite shave shop.All in all, this would make a great gift pack, or a great razor for someone just wanting to get started in wet shaving.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2022
reviews.reviewText: This is a truly decent set. At first I figured it would resemble the wide range of various modest razors you see on Amazon. However, it's somewhat unique. The finishes of the head reach out past the edge of the cutting edge. So you don't have a sharp edge hanging out where it could scratch an ear. The completion is truly great. I have a cleaned chrome look. It likewise accompany a matching stand, and that is something somewhat more pleasant than the rest. I viewed it as a gentle yet effective shave. A razor that a novice could utilize agreeable without a feeling of dread toward getting cut, yet have noteworthy outcomes. This is a pleasant razor set. It feels great made - quite strong with a decent weight to it. The knurling is simply alright it should be more forceful or profound so you get a superior hold on it. I utilized it at the sink and despite the fact that it wasn't slipping a lot, I could perceive it would assuming I involved it in the shower. Is it terrible? However, no, simply alright. The razor looks truly pleasant spotless, exemplary lines. The stand is a smart idea and is helpful - simply be cautious where you put it in the event that it has an edge in it. I utilized one of the included cutting edges and got a decent shave with it. I would agree that it's a move forward from a fledglings' shave, yet not to an extreme. I didn't have to make a lot of passes with it. It's taken care of well indeed - this is giftable to any wet shaver you might be aware. I believe it's somewhat on the expensive side. I can imagine many razors I have that are less expensive (exactly significantly less expensive) that shave basically the same while perhaps worse. However, they may not come bundled too or accompany the stand. Thus, generally speaking, I like this razor and am content with it. This razor has an incredible load to it. The cutting edges are not difficult to introduce, and it accompanies 5 cutting edges. the handle has a great grasp to it, and doesn't slip around once it gets wet and loaded with shaving cream. Has a pleasant weighted base and arrives in a decent magnet close box. This is the conventional monitors razor, and is so very much assembled that it will endure forever. I actually accept that the straight razor is the best shave rather than the four sharp edge plastic ones. This would be an incredible gift for any man.
